properties.name: md_heading_increment
properties.description: MD001 - Heading levels should only increment by one level at a time

properties.name: md_heading_style
properties.description: MD003 - Heading style should be consistent (atx, atx_closed, setext, setext_with_atx, setext_with_atx_closed)

properties.name: md_ul_style
properties.description: MD004 - Unordered list style should be consistent (asterisk, plus, dash, consistent, sublist)

properties.name: md_list_indent
properties.description: MD005 - Inconsistent indentation for list items at the same level

properties.name: md_ul_indent
properties.description: MD007 - Unordered list indentation (default: 2 spaces)

properties.name: md_no_trailing_spaces
properties.description: MD009 - Trailing spaces not allowed

properties.name: md_no_hard_tabs
properties.description: MD010 - Hard tabs not allowed

properties.name: md_no_reversed_links
properties.description: MD011 - Reversed link syntax

properties.name: md_no_multiple_blanks
properties.description: MD012 - Multiple consecutive blank lines

properties.name: md_line_length
properties.description: MD013 - Line length (default: 80 characters)

properties.name: md_commands_show_output
properties.description: MD014 - Dollar signs used before commands without showing output

properties.name: md_no_missing_space_atx
properties.description: MD018 - No space after hash on atx style heading

properties.name: md_no_multiple_space_atx
properties.description: MD019 - Multiple spaces after hash on atx style heading

properties.name: md_no_missing_space_closed_atx
properties.description: MD020 - No space inside hashes on closed atx style heading

properties.name: md_no_multiple_space_closed_atx
properties.description: MD021 - Multiple spaces inside hashes on closed atx style heading

properties.name: md_blanks_around_headings
properties.description: MD022 - Headings should be surrounded by blank lines

properties.name: md_heading_start_left
properties.description: MD023 - Headings must start at the beginning of the line

properties.name: md_no_duplicate_heading
properties.description: MD024 - Multiple headings with the same content

properties.name: md_single_title
properties.description: MD025 - Multiple top-level headings in the same document

properties.name: md_no_trailing_punctuation
properties.description: MD026 - Trailing punctuation in heading

properties.name: md_no_multiple_space_blockquote
properties.description: MD027 - Multiple spaces after blockquote symbol

properties.name: md_no_blanks_blockquote
properties.description: MD028 - Blank line inside blockquote

properties.name: md_ol_prefix
properties.description: MD029 - Ordered list item prefix (one, ordered, one_or_ordered, zero)

properties.name: md_list_marker_space
properties.description: MD030 - Spaces after list markers

properties.name: md_blanks_around_fences
properties.description: MD031 - Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines

properties.name: md_blanks_around_lists
properties.description: MD032 - Lists should be surrounded by blank lines

properties.name: md_no_inline_html
properties.description: MD033 - Inline HTML not allowed

properties.name: md_no_bare_urls
properties.description: MD034 - Bare URL used

properties.name: md_hr_style
properties.description: MD035 - Horizontal rule style should be consistent

properties.name: md_no_emphasis_as_heading
properties.description: MD036 - Emphasis used instead of a heading

properties.name: md_no_space_in_emphasis
properties.description: MD037 - Spaces inside emphasis markers

properties.name: md_no_space_in_code
properties.description: MD038 - Spaces inside code span elements

properties.name: md_no_space_in_links
properties.description: MD039 - Spaces inside link text

properties.name: md_fenced_code_language
properties.description: MD040 - Fenced code blocks should have a language specified

properties.name: md_first_line_heading
properties.description: MD041 - First line in a file should be a top-level heading

properties.name: md_no_empty_links
properties.description: MD042 - No empty links

properties.name: md_required_headings
properties.description: MD043 - Required heading structure

properties.name: md_proper_names
properties.description: MD044 - Proper names should have correct capitalization

properties.name: md_no_alt_text
properties.description: MD045 - Images should have alternate text (alt text)

properties.name: md_code_block_style
properties.description: MD046 - Code block style (fenced, indented, consistent)

properties.name: md_single_trailing_newline
properties.description: MD047 - Files should end with a single newline character

properties.name: md_code_fence_style
properties.description: MD048 - Code fence style (backtick, tilde, consistent)

properties.name: md_emphasis_style
properties.description: MD049 - Emphasis style should be consistent (asterisk, underscore, consistent)

properties.name: md_strong_style
properties.description: MD050 - Strong style should be consistent (asterisk, underscore, consistent)

properties.name: md_link_fragments
properties.description: MD051 - Link fragments should be valid

properties.name: md_reference_links_images
properties.description: MD052 - Reference links and images should use a label that is defined

properties.name: md_link_image_reference_definitions
properties.description: MD053 - Link and image reference definitions should be needed

properties.name: md_link_image_style
properties.description: MD054 - Link and image style (autolink, collapsed, full, inline, shortcut)

properties.name: md_table_pipe_style
properties.description: MD055 - Table pipe style should be consistent

properties.name: md_table_column_count
properties.description: MD056 - Table column count should be consistent

properties.name: md_blanks_around_tables
properties.description: MD058 - Tables should be surrounded by blank lines

properties.name: md_descriptive_link_text
properties.description: MD059 - Link text should be descriptive (avoid 'click here', 'here', 'read more', etc.)

properties.name: md_table_column_style
properties.description: MD060 - Table column style should be consistent

properties.name: md_file_links_exist
properties.description: MD061 - File links should reference existing files

properties.name: md_image_links_exist
properties.description: MD062 - Image links should reference existing files

properties.name: md_root_path
properties.description: Root path for resolving root-relative links (starting with /). Used for Jekyll/GitHub Pages sites. Can be overridden by 'root_path' in YAML front matter.
